title: Acerca de Nosotros

team.name: Ing. Franciso Olaizola
team.text:
Ingeniero civil egresado de la Universidad de Montevideo, con pasaje por la Universidad de Pittsburgh, USA.

Basta experiencia en proyectos de construcción y de desarrollo.

Co fundador de Dwell Developers, dedicados a captar y gestionar inversiones volcadas al sector inmobiliario.

team.name: Ing. Elbio Olaizola
team.text:
Businessman and Director of companies linked to the Engineering and Construction area. Some of the main projects under his management:

- Uruguay International Airport
- Executive Tower of the Presidency of Uruguay
- Corporate Buildings: World Trade Center IV of Montevideo
- Shopping Nuevocentro in Montevideo

He has vast experience in the Uruguayan real estate market. He has participated in important projects such as Fideicomiso Torres Nuevocentro, Oxo Parques and Zen Pueblo Jardín

sub_text: Captamos oportunidades de inversión de forma profesional y creativa. Gestionamos inversiones aplicadas a desarrollos inmobiliarios asegurando resultados y brindando confianza a nuestros clientes. We develope, you Dwell.
